name: Add Account
description: Creates a new patient account that did not exist before for billing and accounts receivable record establishment
hl7Reference: HL7 v2.3 Chapter 6 Financial Management - HL7.eu/HL7v2x/v23/std23
businessPurpose: Transmit patient account creation data from registration/ADT systems to patient accounting or financial systems for billing setup
timing: Sent when a new account needs to be created without notifying systems of patient arrival, or when account span exceeds visit duration
standardNotes: From HL7 v2.3 onward, P01 should only be used for NEW accounts, not updates
Use P05 (update account) for existing account modifications
Use P06 (end account) for account closure
EVN.2 (recorded date/time) should contain the account start date
realWorldScenarios: Patient pre-registration for future services establishes billing account
Insurance pre-authorization creates account before patient arrival
Long-term care facility admission requiring ongoing billing setup
Clinical trial enrollment creates research billing account
Worker's compensation case establishes separate billing account
Self-pay patient account creation for scheduled procedure series

generationRules.GT1: Guarantor information if different from patient
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: Critical - accurate account setup affects all subsequent billing and revenue cycle processes
